attributes.action: Ask for additional motorcycle parking in central london
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the introduction of the congestion charge there is simply not enough places to park motorcycles in central london anymore, surely the whole point of congestion charging is so there are less cars on the road and the revenue is spent on other options, 10 motorcycles can be parked in one car space, look at all other cities in the world 2 wheeled transport can park anywhere as long as its safe to do so, so why not in London?
